main_definition: The accomplishment of an aim or purpose; the attainment of desired goals or fulfillment of expected results.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Achieving positive outcomes in life, work, or a particular endeavor
meanings_and_examples.example: Getting a promotion at her job is a great success for her career.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Reaching goals and fulfilling expectations, often related to personal aspirations
meanings_and_examples.example: Graduating from college with honors was a significant success in his academic journey.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Achieving victory or coming out on top in a competition or challenge
meanings_and_examples.example: Winning the marathon after months of training and hard work was an immense success for him.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Fulfilling financial goals, such as making a profit or earning more than expected income
meanings_and_examples.example: His new business venture has been incredibly successful, surpassing his initial revenue projections.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Achieving personal satisfaction and happiness in life
meanings_and_examples.example: Finding a loving relationship and starting a family brought her immense success and joy.
